explains: n. 法西斯主义；极端国家主义

sentences.en: They heard the protesters shout: "No more fascism!"
sentences.cn: 他们听见抗议者在高呼：“打倒法西斯主义！”

sentences.en: It is the 70th anniversary of both the world's anti-fascism war and the victory of China's Resistance War against Japanese Aggression this year.
sentences.cn: 今年是世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年，也是中国人民抗日战争胜利70周年。

sentences.en: The ideology of the movement was a blend of fascism and ultraconservatism.
sentences.cn: 该运动的意识形态是法西斯主义和超保守主义的融合。
